data.title: New and Used Cars in Summersville, WV
data.meta_description: We are your number one Ford dealer in Summersville, WV! Visit us today and check out the new Ford and used cars we have currently in our inventory.
data.text:
Why Shop Mid-State Ford?

Our commitment to providing exceptional service and amazing deals will surely get you excited about buying a Ford from us.

Whether you want a brand-new Ford or a certified pre-owned vehicle, our friendly and knowledgeable sales team is ready to serve and help you find what you are looking for. They will answer any questions you may have and take you on a test drive in any car, truck or SUV you are interested in. Our team is never pushy, they are here to support you and provide you with all the information you need to make the right decision about your purchase. Once you have found the one, our finance team can help you get an auto loan so that you can drive off the lot with the car you want. They can help you get the payment plan and rate that best fits your lifestyle.

You can shop around if you’d like, but why waste time? We're here to make your car buying experience stress-free and easy! Come visit us today!

Excellent Selection

With our wide selection of brand-new Ford models in Summersville, WV, you’re sure to find exactly what you have been looking for. We invite you to explore our new Ford inventory of trucks, SUVs and sedans. The EcoSport, Edge, Expedition and Explorer are auto options that many families choose because of the comfort and roomy cabin feeling. Trucks are also very popular among the working class, as they provide a powerful ride with the ability to complete tough jobs. Like the Ford F-150 that comes in various trim level options. We also have the Ford F-250, F-350 and F-450 of high performance.

But if you are in the market for a used car, we have vehicles at an affordable price from different auto makers. These certified pre-owned vehicles come with a full assessment of the car’s history and services. Make sure you check out available inventory of used cars here in Summersville, WV. No matter what your budget is, we can help you find the perfect car!

Auto Service After the Sale

Owning a vehicle doesn't end when you drive off the lot. There are many regular maintenance and service requirements necessary to keep your vehicle in tip top shape. That is why we are committed to service your car after the sale. It's just as important to us that you come back for all your service and parts needs as it is to help you find the right vehicle. Our trained technicians are dedicated provide you with quality service in a professional and timely manner. Bring your vehicle to us for oil changes, tune-ups, brake jobs, and more.

We make it as convenient as possible by providing you with an online form that allows you to schedule an appointment that works for you. Just fill out the form letting us know what type of service you need, and we'll be ready to get the job done right to get you back on the road quick.
